entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
